resources.string: On City Campus, Avery Hall is southeast of Memorial Stadium and home to the Math and Computer Science departments
This page is currently under construction

string.name: contribute
string.u: Click here if you would like to contribute and add a bathroom

resources.string: Men\'s bathrooms will be denoted by an \"M\", followed by a number (Ex:M1). Women\'s bathrooms will be denoted by an \"W\", followed by a number (Ex:W1).

The largest bathroom in Avery, this bathroom boasts seven stalls(two handicap), three urinals, and four sinks. In between classes this bathroom becomes very busy, causing it to be quite messy at times. What do I mean by messy? Sometimes you go into a stall and it looks like teenagers were TP-ing a house that wouldn\'t give them candy on Halloween. Because of the amount of traffic, this bathroom gets 3 stars in spite of it\'s large amount of amenities.

A typical bathroom in burnett hall, this bathroom boasts 4 stalls(1 handicap), 2 urinals, and 2 sinks. There is always free because no classroom in here. if you are unable to find avaliable space. it'd s good choice to go basement.there is also the most clean place in burnett hall

A typical bathroom in burnett hall, this bathroom boasts 4 stalls(1 handicap), 2 urinals, and 2 sinks. There are lost of classroom in here so it is busy between class. but the cleaniness in here is very good.

A typical bathroom in burnett hall, this bathroom boasts 4 stalls(1 handicap), 2 urinals, and 2 sinks. There are some classroom in here but not very much.It's is empty in most time and get better cleaniness than first floor.
A typical bathroom in burnett hall, this bathroom boasts 4 stalls(1 handicap), 2 urinals, and 2 sinks. This bathroom is always empty unless come to lunch time.the cleaniness is also very good

On the busiest floor of Avery sits the smallest bathroom in the building. One urinal, one stall, and two sinks. If you try to use this bathroom in between classes, prepare to wait in line. If you\'re patient enough to wait in line, you will realize the pressure on your shoulders once it\'s your turn. You can feel the eyes on the back of your head, glaring at you to hurry up and finish. Expect no privacy in here. The only plus side of this bathroom is it is relatively clean for how much traffic it receives. This is because if someone makes a mess, it\'s easy to find the culprit. There is no way you can wash your hands and exit the bathroom without someone seeing what you\'ve done. You will be caught.

Avery\'s best kept secret. I was hesitant to write an honest review for this bathroom because of the increased activity that is bound to come. Two urinals, two stalls(one handicap), and three sinks are more than enough for this hidden gem. Due to the low amount of traffic, this bathroom is exceptionally clean. Come here for a relaxing experience, whether it\'s relieving yourself or simply sitting in a stall and enjoying a sandwich.
Two urinals, two stalls(one handicap), three sinks. Identical to the bathroom on the second floor but a little more traffic. Nothing special about this bathroom, but it will get the job done.

If you would like to have a bathroom added to the app, please include: 
 - what building and floor the bathroom is in 
 - a rating 
 - a picture of the bathroom 
 - a review
